species.name: whirlipede
descriptions: It is usually motionless, but when attacked, it rotates at high speed and then crashes into its opponent.
Protected by a hard shell, it spins its body like a wheel and crashes furiously into its enemies.
Storing energy for evolution, it sits. But, when predators approach, it moves to stab them with poison spikes.
This Pokémon spins itself rapidly and charges into its opponents. Its top speed is just over 60 mph.
Whirlipede protects itself with a sturdy shell and poisonous spikes while it stores up the energy it’ll need for evolution.

abilities.name: poison-point
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of poisoning attacking Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: swarm
abilities.effect: Strengthens bug moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

abilities.name: speed-boost
abilities.effect: Raises Speed one stage after each turn.
